title: Stock Market Today: Dow Jones, S&P 500 Futures Gain Following Stellar Chipmaker Rally—Chevron, Paysafe, J.B. Hunt Transport In Focus
text: U.S. stock futures rose on Friday following Thursday's positive close. Futures of major benchmark indices were higher.

title: J.B. Hunt Transport, PNC Financial And 3 Stocks To Watch Heading Into Friday
text: US stock futures higher on Friday, M&T Bank, J.B. Hunt, and State Street expected to report earnings. QXO announces stock offering.

title: QXO Announces Pricing of Common Stock Offering
text: GREENWICH, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) (the “Company” or “QXO”) today announced the pricing of its previously announced public offering of 31,645,570 shares of its common stock (the “Offering”) at a price to public of $23.80 per share. The Offering is expected to close on January 20, 2026, subject to customary closing conditions. QXO has granted the underwriter of the Offering an option to purchase up to an additional 4,746,835 shares of common stock at the public offering pri.

title: QXO Announces Common Stock Offering
text: GREENWICH, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) (the “Company” or “QXO”) today announced it intends to make an offering of $750 million of shares of its common stock (the “Offering”). QXO's common stock is listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol “QXO.” QXO intends to grant the underwriter of the Offering an option to purchase up to an additional $112.5 million of shares of common stock at the public offering price less underwriting discounts and commissions. QXO intends.

title: QXO Announces Fourth Quarter Summarized Preliminary Financial Information
text: GREENWICH, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--QXO, Inc. (“QXO” or the “Company”) (NYSE: QXO) today announced the following summarized preliminary financial information. The Company expects to file its annual report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2025 on February 26, 2026.
